important-information-paragraph-1.message: This page is for the Microsoft Edge desktop extension. Get Adblock Plus products on other supported platforms and devices.

hero-banner-alt.message: The Adblock Plus for Edge interface

hero-subheading.message: Block ads on Edge and enjoy a cleaner, faster and safer web

hero-paragraph-1.message: Adblock Plus blocks advertisements which might be intrusive and malicious, while supporting website creators by allowing Acceptable Ads by default (this, however, is configurable).

hero-download-tos.message: By clicking on the button below, you agree to our Terms of Use

hero-download-label.message: Get Adblock Plus for Microsoft Edge

hero-download-other-label.message: Download Adblock Plus for another browser

special-features-heading.message: What you can do with Adblock Plus for Edge

special-features-paragraph-1.message: Adblock Plus is an extension that lets you block ads on Edge for an improved internet browsing experience. Get rid of annoying and intrusive advertisements, including pop-ups and video ads on Youtube. Adblock Plus can help protect you from tracking and malicious ads, and lets you block specific elements on websites.

how-it-works-image-alt.message: How the ABP ad blocking extension for Edge looks

how-it-works-heading.message: How our ad blocker for Edge works

how-it-works-paragraph-1.message: It has never been easier to set up an ad block for Microsoft Edge. Once you download Adblock Plus, the extension will appear in your browser toolbar and will automatically block ads on Edge. Users can add websites to their allowlist and use filters through the Settings option.

how-it-works-paragraph-2.message: If you need help with installation, you can click here for instructions on how to install Adblock Plus on Microsoft Edge .

supporting-websites-image-alt.message: Support websites with the Acceptable Ads initiative

supporting-websites-paragraph-1.message: Adblock Plus comes by default with Acceptable Ads enabled, though this can be turned off easily at any time. By using the Acceptable Ads feature, you are still blocking annoying and intrusive ads, but allowing some nonintrusive advertisement. This allows content producers to receive monetization for their work and helps create an environment of fairness and sustainability for user, advertiser, and creator alike. Learn more

download-paragraph-1.message: By downloading and installing this extension, you agree to our Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy.

download-button-label.message: Get Adblock Plus for Microsoft Edge

download-other-label.message: Download Adblock Plus for another browser
